attributes.action: Stop Leeds United from changing their badge
attributes.additional_details:
Leeds United are one of Britain's oldest football clubs, founded in 1919. We most recently won the English top division in 1992. Since then the club has experienced highs and lows such as the Champions League semi final in 2001 and more recently relegation to the third division.

We have experienced ups and downs but one thing we have not has to endure is our identity being ripped from us. This badge change says otherwise.
attributes.background: This badge change is ludicrous, truly disgusting and against fan demand.
